author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-8515] Fixing the AvatarNode port in the single node template
Summary: The AvatarNode port is wrong in the single node template. This causes the HMaster to throw an exception when used in the single node mode.
Test Plan: The HMaster started up successfully when started in a single node mode.
Reviewers: liyintang, aaiyer, rshroff, adela, shaneh, manukranthk
